name: PicniCross
description:
You want to have the perfect picnic, so you must be sure to perfectly organize your food on the picnic mat in this picross meets tetris puzzle game!

Made during less than 48 hours for Create Jam Spring 2022

Controls:
The game only uses the mouse.
Left mouse button to pick up food.
Right mouse button to rotate food.
You can skip and go back levels with the arrow keys.

Made in Unity using the assets listed below.

Font is not mine:
Humble Fonts Gold by somepx at https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold

Sound effects are not mine:
Pat Cloth by annstory4520 at https://freesound.org/people/annstory4520/sounds/513428/
clothes drop 1 by ZoviPoland at https://freesound.org/people/ZoviPoland/sounds/517726/
Eating v2.mp3 by HerraBilbo at https://freesound.org/people/HerraBilbo/sounds/360685/
Wooshes by WavJunction.com at https://freesound.org/people/WavJunction.com/sounds/512683/
spring in the woods - rear by craftcrest at https://freesound.org/people/craftcrest/sounds/349036/
